column2: I would absolutely visit this museum again
column3: there is a lot that I missed
column4: and there were a few items that I wanted to see that were out on loan
column5: or having conservation work done. Just be prepared for a very long day. The museum is only open from 1030 am to 5 pm daily
column6: so you could easily spend an entire day there. Definitely get there before they open to queue up.
